description:
The official car driving theory test comes with Palm Pre. Prepare your theory test for car with latest and official DSA question bank which has over 963 questions.

"The application is extremely well designed and very well organised, It will prove a valuable resource to those taking their driving theory test" - iCreate Magazine.


PREPARE BY TOPICS

You can study the highway code by topic. All questions are sorted by topic. It also tell you the areas that each topic covers.
1) Accidents.
2) Alertness.
3) Documents.
4) Hazard Awareness.
5) Motorway Rules.
6) Other type of Vehicle.
7) Road and Traffic signs.
8) Rules of the Road.
9) Safety Margins
10) Safety and Your Vehicle
11) Vehicle Handling
12) Vehicle Loading
13) Vulnerable Road users

MOCK TEST MODE

Mock Test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from all the topics.


PROGRESS METER

The app records your progress as you start giving practice test.   
It shows you a beautiful animated bar chart so that you can track your weak areas and retry the questions you answered incorrectly.


FEATURE LIST

1) Over 963 multiple choice questions
2) Choose number of questions you would like in each test
3) Shows test result in HTML format
4) A new module, "Progress Meter" keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topic and retry the questions you answered incorrectly
5) Special algorithm that randomizes questions you take a test
6) Mock Test has exactly similar format as in real test
